div.l: And on þe nose he smot him with his fist
Doun ran þe blodi streme on his brist
And in þe floor with nose and mouþe to broke
Þei walowe as doþ too pigges in a poke
And vp þei gon and doun agayn anoon
Til þat þe Meller spurned at a stoon
And doun he fil bacward on his wif
That wist noþing of þis nyce strif
For she was falle aslepe a litul wight
With Iohn þe clerc þat waked had al night
And wiþ þe falle out of hir slepe she braide
Help holi crosse of Bromholme she saide
In manus tuas Lorde to þe I calle
Awake Symond þe fende on me is falle
Min hert is broken help I am but dede
Ther lith oon vpon myn wombe and vp my hede
Helpe simkyn for þe fals clerkꝭes fighte
This Iohn start vp as fast as eủere he mighte
And graspede bi þe walles too and fro
To fynden astaf and she stert vp also
And kneuh þe Estris bet þan did þat Iohn
And bi þe wal a staf she fonde anon̄
And saugh a litel shemering of a light
For at an hool in shon þe mone bright
And bi þat light she saugh hem boþe too
But sikerli she nyst who was whoo
But as she saugh awhite þing in hir͗e eie
And whan she gan þis white þing aspie
She wende þe clerc had wered a volipere
And with þe staf she drough ay nere and nere
And wende han hit þis Aleyn at fulle
And smoot þe mellere on þe piled sculle
Þat doun̄ he goþ and cried harrowe I di
